Item ID24397

The tier 2 twisted hat is a tradeable cosmetic item. It is part of the tier 2 tier 2 Twisted Relic Hunter, which can be purchased for 2,500 League points from the Leagues Reward Shop.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room. It can also be displayed (with the rest of the outfit) by using it on furniture built in the League hall's outfit stand space.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 January 2020
(update)
  • The item is now obtainable by players.
  • The item's value was increased from 500 to 10,000.
  • The item was made tradeable on the Grand Exchange.
  • The item could now be made into banknotes.
14 November 2019
(update)

The item was added to the game.

[[File:Twisted hat (t2) detail.png|left|140px]]
[[File:Twisted hat (t2) chathead.png|left]]
The '''tier 2 twisted hat''' is a tradeable cosmetic item. It is part of the tier 2 [[Twisted Relic Hunter (T2)|tier 2 Twisted Relic Hunter]], which can be purchased for 2,500 League points from the [[Leagues Reward Shop]].

{{Costume storage|armour case}} It can also be displayed (with the rest of the outfit) by using it on furniture built in the [[League hall]]'s [[outfit stand space]].
